positions.description:
Effectively manage constituent database to ensure an average of 3000 constituents weekly
receive accurate and timely responses from the Senator.

Lead collaborations between state, legislative, and communication staff to improve strategic
interactions with constituents, VIPs, and opinion makers.

Advise senior staff on best ways to use database to meet office goals.
positions.title: Correspondence Manager

positions.description:
Manage a team of Staff Assistants and Interns that provide high quality constituent relations to every person who comes in contact with the office.

Oversee constituent service database to ensure constituents receive timely and adequate answers to legislative questions. 

Write, edit, and proof legislative and personal correspondences for the Senator.
positions.title: Mail Room Coordinator

positions.description:
Worked with the Chief of Staff, Deputy Chief of Staff, and Administrative Director in the opening of a high profile freshman Senator's office. 

Initiated processes to provide the utmost in constituent relations.
positions.title: Staff Assistant

positions.description:
Assisted with the news making process for the office. Answered and forwarded calls from the press line. Wrote and proofread news releases.

Followed news coverage of the congressman and related issues. Gathered and distributed press clippings. Followed opinion makers from the district.

Engaged with constituents through digital media. Wrote, edited, and posted to social networks. Updated the website. Graphic design work.
positions.title: Press Intern

positions.description:
Coordinated daily camera and audio logistics for newscasts. Assisted with floor directing, fact checks, teleprompter operation and news ticker software. Assisted directors, producers, and talent to ensure smooth running productions. Coordinated with directors on sequences, desired effects, camera movements, and lighting.

Printed scripts, perform research, and operate teleprompter. Maintained familiarity with local, national and international current events, important issues and newsmakers.

Assisted with coverage and logistics of live events. Participated and helped with logistics for the 10 hour Childrenâs Miracle Network Marathon. Ran cameras, floor directing, ensured talent and guests were in appropriate location. Field produced the Stock Show & Rodeo coverage. Tracked scores, located interviews and researched interview subjects, assisted with editing of video, and coordinated with control room for graphics and timing of live shots.
positions.title: Production Assistant

positions.description:
Created a social media and web presence for the church. Managed pay-per-click campaigns, improved website navigation, usability, and accessibility. Created visually appealing interfaces through web designs. Assisted in website upkeep.

Assisted with the advertising program. Created brochures, flyers, posters, billboards, and PowerPoint presentations. Filmed, directed, edited videos and commercials.

Operated audio equipment for events and functions, which include microphones, sound speakers, video screens, projectors, video monitors, recording equipment, connecting wires and cables. 

Maintain quality and maintenance of audio and video equipment. Test, troubleshoot and resolve equipment issues. Diagnose and correct media system problems.  Served as a support resource for the church staff on multimedia development issues. 

Handled daily operations of the office.
positions.title: Media Director
